text: Rika Zaraï (; 19 February 1938 – 23 December 2020) was an Israeli singer- songwriter. She was best known for making classic Israeli songs popular in Europe such as Hava Nagila, Yerushalayim shel zahav and Hallelujah. ==Death== In June 2008, Zaraï suffered from a paralytic stroke. She died on 23 December 2020 in Paris, aged 82. ==Songs== *Chante Israël (1962) *Rika Zaraï (1964) *Un beau jour je partirai (1967) *Alors je chante (1969) *Moi le dimanche (1971) *Les Dessins animés (1973) *Chansons d'Israël (1973) *Ma poupée de France (1975) *Dad li di (1979) *Chante l'ami (1982) *L'Espoir (1983) *Sans rancune et sans regret (1985) *Story (1988) *Hava (2000) *Quand les hommes (2007) ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Israeli singer-songwriters Category:Musicians from Jerusalem
title: Rika Zaraï
